title: How do I reset my password if I forget it?
content: If you forget your password, you will need to reinstall the app. Please note that reinstalling the app will result in the loss of all saved notes.

title: How does PaperBit encrypt my notes?
content: PaperBit uses AES-256 encryption to securely store your notes on your device. This ensures that your notes are only accessible by you.

title: Can I backup my notes?
content: Currently, PaperBit does not support automatic backups. However, you can manually export your notes to a secure location.

title: Is there a limit to the number of notes I can create?
content: There is no limit to the number of notes you can create in PaperBit. The only limitation is the available storage space on your device.

title: How can I export my notes?
content: You can export your notes by going to the settings menu and selecting the export option. This will allow you to save your notes to a secure location of your choice.

title: How do I delete a note?
content: To delete a note, long-press on the note you want to delete and select the delete option from the menu.

title: Can I categorize my notes?
content: Yes, PaperBit allows you to categorize your notes. You can create custom categories and assign notes to them for better organization.

title: Is there a dark mode available?
content: Yes, PaperBit includes a dark mode option that you can enable from the settings menu.

title: How secure is PaperBit?
content: PaperBit is highly secure. It uses AES-256 encryption to store notes, and access is protected by a numeric password. Ensure your password is strong and not shared with others.

title: What happens if I lose my phone?
content: If you lose your phone, your notes remain encrypted and secure. However, if you don't have a backup, the notes will be irretrievable without your password.

title: How do I change my password?
content: To change your password, go to the settings menu and select the change password option. You will need to enter your current password to set a new one.

title: Can I sync my notes across multiple devices?
content: Currently, PaperBit does not support syncing notes across multiple devices. All notes are stored locally on your device.

title: What should I do if the app crashes?
content: If the app crashes, try restarting your device and opening the app again. If the issue persists, please contact our support team for assistance.

title: How can I contact support?
content: You can contact our support team by emailing support@paperbit.com. We aim to respond to all queries within 24 hours.
